Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui

Class GUI

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.GUI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
public class GUI
extends javafx.application.Application
implements UI
GUI class starts the graphical user interface, mapping each scene to the specific phase. It's triggered when an event change is reported by the server, calling the correct components in order to make the local modification.
See Also:
UI, Application

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Main class of the GUI, which is called from the "Santorini" launcher in case user decides to play with it.
      Parameters:
      args - of type String[] - parsed arguments.

    • run

      public void run()
      Method run sets the title of the main stage and launches the window.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Overrides:
      stop in class javafx.application.Application
      See Also:
      Application.stop()

    • setup

      public void setup()
      Method setup creates all the stage phases which will be updated in other methods, in particular: - MENU: the game's main menu with Play and Quit buttons; - SETUP: small windows containing player's inserted nickname, the server IP and port; - LOADER: the game loader containing player's chosen color, god power and places their workers; - GUI: the effective game GUI (island board). Each stage scene is put inside an hashmap, which links their name to their fxml filename.

    • getListeners

      public java.beans.PropertyChangeSupport getListeners()
      Method getListeners returns the listeners of this GUI object.
      Returns:
      the listeners (type PropertyChangeSupport) of this GUI object.

    • centerApplication

      public void centerApplication()
      Method centerApplication centers the application windows in the screen, based on user's screen height and width; getting them from the Screen java class.

    • changeStage

      public void changeStage​(java.lang.String newScene)
      Method changeStage changes the stage scene based on the ones declared during setup phase. On method call the actual stage scene is replaced from the parameter one.
      Parameters:
      newScene - of type String - the scene displayed.
